data_variables.name: num
data_variables.description: A number to be rounded to two decimal places in the round_to_two_places function.

data_variables.name: total_candies
data_variables.description: Total number of candies to be distributed in the to_smash function.

data_variables.name: no_of_friends
data_variables.description: The number of friends among whom the candies are to be split in the to_smash function.

data_variables.name: t
data_variables.description: Time in seconds since the epoch in the time_call function.

data_variables.name: duration
data_variables.description: Duration to sleep in seconds used in the time_call function.

data_flow.created_by: round_to_two_places function, rounds a number to two decimal places
data_flow.flows_to: no specific flow, but used for output in the function.

data_flow.created_by: to_smash function which calculates candies left after distribution
data_flow.flows_to: no specific flow, but used for output in the function.

data_flow.created_by: parameter in to_smash function. Defaults to 3
data_flow.flows_to: no specific flow, but influences the result in the to_smash function.

data_flow.created_by: time function that captures current time in seconds
data_flow.flows_to: Used to track elapsed time in time_call.

data_flow.created_by: set as a variable in the sleep function
data_flow.flows_to: Used to pause execution in the time_call function.
